author: cms-sw
body: To avoid a massive code formatting with LLVM21, as proposes in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49293/changes#diff-1026e0038b722990204a42bed8a6f7c0ec2302aa79e3fad1959d62ba968edfa2, this PR suggested to enable DerivePointerAlignment code-format option. This should allow us a minimal code formatting change with new LLVM 21
title: Enable DerivePointerAlignment in clang-format
